name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **.NET Core**, **Angular**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript** to deliver high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Demonstrated proficiency in **Clean Architecture**, **Microservices**, and **API Rest** design, ensuring robust, maintainable solutions. Strong skills in **RabbitMQ** for messaging, **Unit Testing** for delivering quality code, and **TailwindCSS** for modern UI design.
Experienced in frontend and backend development leveraging additional frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, as well as backend technologies like **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record in building AI/ML-powered platforms emphasizing predictive analytics and real-time data processing. Proficient in cloud deployments using **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and adopting event-driven architectures.
Committed to compliance-driven development with a strong focus on standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, possess a solid background in MLOps utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for model management.
